mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SUBQUERY.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_TYPE AS boardType, P.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, C.COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, TO_CHAR(C.COMMENTED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS commentDate FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON P.POST_NUMBER = C.POST_NUMBER WHERE C.COMMENT_DELETE_STATE = 'N' AND C.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} ) SUBQUERY )
SELECT count(P.POST_TITLE ) FROM TBL_POST P INNER JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON P.POST_NUMBER = C.POST_NUMBER WHERE C.COMMENT_DELETE_STATE = 'N' AND C.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
